content: what could be sweeter than wrapping a little one in hugs and kisses this little blanket features a simple x s and o s stitch pattern so that you can do just that **skill** crochet **difficulty** easy sizes one size **finished measurements** width 26 length 31½ **materials** **universal yarn** *major* 1 100% acrylic 200g/328 yds 124 mermaid 2 skeins hook us size j/10 6 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle **gauge** 14¼ sts x 6¾ row = 4 in x s and o s patt after blocking save time check your gauge **pattern notes** this blanket is worked flat from the bottom up 1 https //universalyarn com/products/major
